name: SouthLommaGarbageupdate
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This is a first stab at creating an Alexa skill. It grabs information about garbage collection from Sysav, transforms it and reads it to you as a News flash.
